fullq.subject: biology
fullq.question: Which of the following BEST explains how cyclic AMP can cause so many different intracellular responses in a mammalian cell:
fullq.w_choice: it is produced in large quantities
fullq.x_choice: it migrates to the DNA where it binds to a variety of histones
fullq.y_choice: it activates a wide variety of specific protein kinases
fullq.z_choice: it prevents the activation of other hormonal signals

fullq.y_choice: joining multiple copies of structural genes

fullq.subject: physics
fullq.question: Which of the following BEST explains how a radium isotope with a half-life of about 1,600 years can be found in the crust of the Earth that was formed millions of years ago:
fullq.w_choice: its decay is slowed by the pressure of the Earth
fullq.x_choice: the radium is replenished by decay of longer lived radioactive elements
fullq.y_choice: the radium was replenished by meteors and asteroids over the millennia
fullq.z_choice: the radium is recycled from the Earth’s core where magnetic fields slow the decay

fullq.z_choice: difficulty in PET radiotracers binding to receptors when imaging certain human tissues
